pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Django command tool for visualizing migration graphs========================================================How to Use==========1. Install----------Install the pip package locally or globally:.. code:: shell pip install [--user] django-migration-vis2. Activate-----------Enable the Django management command by extending your Django projectsettings:.. code:: python INSTALLED_APPS += ("django_migration_vis", )3. Apply--------.. code:: shell python manage.py visualizemigrations \ --comment 'captions for the picture' \ example.gv
